html:
i'll plant a rose
to start multiple questions
their smell will be narcotic
the spikes are supposed to shed blood
it'll happen under the moon
helping myself with a flashlight
like a serial killer
trying to silently get rid of a corpse
then i will care for the rose
so it can be the proudest plant around
and when the right day comes
i will cut the best branch of all
just to gift it to someone special
the smell will be narcotic
but i wont get rid of the spikes
they're supposed to shed blood
title: Rose
